title: Chat Filter in the Updated Client
body:
Currently I have the box for "Enable Language Filter" unchecked in the updated client but curse words in game are still censored.  In the Legacy client, when I had this setting unchecked, it removed the filter in game as well. 
Is there anything that I'm missing or a new setting that causes these to be separated now? What can I do to fix this?

replies.body:
This is a bug that we've seen with the later versions of the Beta Client. I'd recommend making a post on the [**Bug Tracker**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) so we can keep an eye on this. For now, I'd recommend hopping back into the Legacy Client to see if the chat filter functions properly for you there.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.

This is the second report on this, and my thinking is that it would be due to the updated client.  If the legacy client isn't toggling the filter, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to dig into your issue individually.  We can take a look and see what's up!
